text:
Nervous System Germ Cell Tumors
How to diagnose Childhood Central Nervous System Germ Cell Tumors ?,"Imaging studies and tests are used to detect (find) and diagnose childhood CNS germ cell tumors. The following tests and procedures may be used:         -   Physical exam and history : An exam of the body to check general signs of health, including checking for signs of disease, such as lumps or anything else that seems unusual.
